**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 403 4.0 **Bloodlines** [Draconic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=5), [Wyrmblessed](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=17) **Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Duration** 1 minute --- Vicious claws grow from your fingers. They are [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179) unarmed attacks that deal 1d4 slashing damage and 1d6 extra damage of a type determined by the dragon in your bloodline. ## Dragon Claws
**Dragon Type****Damage Type**
[Black](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=165), [brine](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=175)*, or [copper](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=172)Acid
[Blue](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=166), [bronze](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=171), [cloud](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=176)*, or [sky](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=229)*Electricity
[Brass](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=170), [gold](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=173), [magma](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=178)*, [red](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=168), or [underworld](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=231)*Fire
[Crystal](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=177)* or [forest](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=227)*Piercing
[Green](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=167)Poison
[Sea](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=228)*Bludgeoning
[Silver](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=174) or [white](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=169)Cold
[Sovereign](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=230)*Mental
[Umbral](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=179)*Negative
***Source** [_Mwangi Expanse pg. 76_](https://paizo.com/products/btq027ot)

Your scales from blood magic glow with faint energy, giving you resistance 5 to the same damage type. --- **Heightened (5th)** The extra damage increases to 2d6, and the resistance increases to 10. **Heightened (9th)** The extra damage increases to 3d6, and the resistance increases to 15.
